comment.author: 67908005@N02
comment._content: When adding this interesting photo to the Clerestory Coaches (Railways) Group, in line with many other photos already there and as only the picture owner can do this, please kindly geotag, where possible, to identify the location of this picture, for the benefit of many of the world wide members! In the new photostream layout, click on "Add this Photo to your map" on the top of the right hand side of the white space. In case of need refer to Slides 2 & 3 in this set. Many thanks.

comment.author: 66311327@N05
